itunes:title: Episode 739 - Special Guest Matthew McConaughey
title: Episode 739 - Special Guest Matthew McConaughey
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Academy Award winner Matthew McConaughey over a few glasses of McConaughey’s whiskey Wild Turkey Longbranch to talk about his new autobiography “Greenlights” and the audiobook version he narrated, behind the ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Academy Award winner Matthew McConaughey over a few glasses of McConaughey’s whiskey Wild Turkey Longbranch to talk about his new autobiography “Greenlights” and the audiobook version he narrated, behind the scenes stories from Dazed and Confused and Wolf of Wall Street, University of Texas football coaching rumors, and how he drove Woody Harrelson insane on the set of True Detective. Greatest show ever.

Greatest show ever.
